meanings.definition: A person or thing that duplicates.
meanings.sent1: The duplicator copied the drawing perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The duplicator in the office made copies of important papers.
meanings.sent3: The duplicator at the party was the one who always repeated jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a duplicator, effortlessly replicating every detail.
meanings.sent5: The duplicator's ability to mimic voices was uncanny.

meanings.definition: A machine for making duplicates of documents.
meanings.sent1: The duplicator in the library was always busy with students' requests.
meanings.sent2: The office purchased a new duplicator to speed up document reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The duplicator at the school was known for its constant paper jams.
meanings.sent4: The duplicator hummed softly as it churned out copies, like a tireless worker.
meanings.sent5: The duplicator's efficiency saved the team a lot of time.
